title: Geography (Japan): History (Usefulness 1)
description: Traveler usefulness 1/10 phrases for the History subcategory within Geography (Japan). Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: Nagasaki is one of the two cities that experienced the atomic bomb during the Second World War.
cards.romaji: Nagasaki wa, dai ni-ji sekai taisench. ni gembaku no higai o uketa futatsu no toshi no hitotsu desu.
cards.japanese: 長崎は、第二次世界大戦中に原爆の被害を受けた二つの都市の一つです。
